snippet: The United States pegged Europe's lead back to one point after an extraordinary exhibition of shotmaking in a record-breaking morning fourball session at the 40th Ryder Cup on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Records Fall as Europe Lead by Point After Birdie Blitz
headline.main: Records Fall as Europe Lead by Point After Birdie Blitz

lead_paragraph: The United States pegged Europe's lead back to one point after an extraordinary exhibition of shotmaking in a record-breaking morning fourball session at the 40th Ryder Cup on Saturday.
